briefTitle: An Integrated Assessment of the Safety and Effectiveness of Bexagliflozin for the Management of Essential Hypertension
officialTitle: An Integrated Assessment of the Safety and Effectiveness of Bexagliflozin Tablets, 20 mg, for the Management of Essential Hypertension
summary: This integrated assessment consists of two studies, 603A and 603B, to be carried out sequentially in a common study population. Participating subjects informed of the trial design and their consent to participate in both studies were to be obtained in a single consent form. Approximately 680 male or female adult subjects were to be enrolled.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change of the 24 Hour Mean Systolic Blood Pressure From Baseline (Day 1) to Week 12
